Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PlaySound = Tool:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
HitGroundSound = Handle:WaitForChild("HitGround") JumpDownSound = Handle:WaitForChild("JumpDown") SlashSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash")
JumpUp = Tool:WaitForChild("JumpUp") JumpDown = Tool:WaitForChild("JumpDown") LeftSlash = Tool:WaitForChild("LeftSlash") RightSlash = Tool:WaitForChild("RightSlash")
Equip = false Active = false SlashCoolDown = false JumpCoolDown = false OriginalWalkSpeed = 0 LastClick = 0 Clicks = 0 HitGround = false HitParts = {} PlayersUpHit = {}
HandleTouchedConnection = nil
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function CheckTable(Table, Object) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == Object then return true end end return false end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function PartsHit(Parts) for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then local PartHit PartHit = v.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then HitGround = true for i, v in pairs(Parts) do end end end) table.insert(HitParts, PartHit) end end end
function JumpUpTouchEnabled() HandleTouchedConnection = Handle.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 and not CheckTable(PlayersUpHit, character) then local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then table.insert(PlayersUpHit, character) UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(20) torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 148, 0) end end end end) return HandleTouchedConnection end
function JumpDownTouchEnabled() HandleTouchedConnection = Handle.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 and CheckTable(PlayersUpHit, character) then local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then for i, v in pairs(PlayersUpHit) do if v == character then table.remove(PlayersUpHit, i) end end UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(40) torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, -5, 0) end end end end) return HandleTouchedConnection end
function Attack() Active = true Spawn(function() if (not SlashCoolDown and (not SlashAnim or SlashAnim.KeyframeReached)) then SlashCoolDown = true local PossibleAnims = {RightSlash, LeftSlash} local ChosenAnim = PossibleAnims[math.random(1, #PossibleAnims)] SlashAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(ChosenAnim) SlashAnim:Play() PlaySound.Value = SlashSound.Name HandleTouchedConnection = Handle.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(5) end end end) Delay(0.5, function() if HandleTouchedConnection then HandleTouchedConnection:disconnect() end end) wait(0.5) SlashCoolDown = false end end) Active = false end
function DoubleClick() --Idea suggested by nintendocpu/Bayshicpu if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent then JumpCoolDown = true Active = true JumpUpAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(JumpUp) JumpDownAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(JumpDown)
OriginalWalkSpeed = Humanoid.WalkSpeed Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0
JumpUpAnim:Play(0, 1, 8) Humanoid.Jump = true Torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 150, 0)
JumpTouchedConnection = JumpUpTouchEnabled()
Delay(1.5, function() if JumpTouchedConnection then JumpTouchedConnection:disconnect() end end)
while Torso.Velocity.Y > 0 do wait() end
if Equip then if JumpTouchedConnection then JumpTouchedConnection:disconnect() end
JumpTouchedConnection = JumpDownTouchEnabled()
Delay(1, function() if JumpTouchedConnection then JumpTouchedConnection:disconnect() end end)
JumpUpAnim:Stop() JumpDownAnim:Play(0, 1, 10) PlaySound.Value = JumpDownSound.Name Torso.Velocity = Torso.Velocity - Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
RightLeg = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Leg") LeftLeg = Character:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") PartsHit({RightLeg, LeftLeg}) while not HitGround do wait() end HitGround = false for i, v in pairs(HitParts) do if v then v:disconnect() end end HitParts = {} PlayersUpHit = {} JumpDownAnim:Stop() PlaySound.Value = HitGroundSound.Name Humanoid.WalkSpeed = OriginalWalkSpeed Active = false end wait(2) JumpCoolDown = false end end
function Activated() if not Active then local Tick = tick() if HandleTouchedConnection then HandleTouchedConnection:disconnect() end if LastClick == 0 or (Tick - LastClick) <= 0.25 and not JumpCoolDown then LastClick = Tick Clicks = Clicks + 1 if Clicks >= 2 then LastClick = 0 Clicks = 0 local Hit, Pos = RayCast(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (Torso.Size * 2), {Character}) if Hit and Hit.Parent then if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Stop() end DoubleClick() end else Attack() end else Attack() Clicks = 1 LastClick = Tick end end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Equip = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or not Torso then return end StartingWalkSpeed = Humanoid.WalkSpeed Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 32 end
function Unequipped() Equip = false Active = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = StartingWalkSpeed if HandleTouchedConnection then HandleTouchedConnection:disconnect() end if JumpTouchedConnection then JumpTouchedConnection:disconnect() end if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Stop() end if JumpUpAnim then JumpUpAnim:Stop() end if JumpDownAnim then JumpDownAnim:Stop() end for i, v in pairs(HitParts) do if v then v:disconnect() end end HitParts = {} PlayersUpHit = {} end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Tool:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
PlaySound.Value = ""
PlaySound.Changed:connect(function() if PlaySound.Value ~= "" then local Sound = Handle:FindFirstChild(PlaySound.Value) if Sound then Sound:Play() end PlaySound.Value = "" end end)

Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
